newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINLAND BANK JAN REQUIRED RESERVES FIM 6.32 BLN.
newsitem.headline: FINLAND BANK JAN REQUIRED RESERVES FIM 6.32 BLN.

text.p: The Bank of Finland said on
Tuesday the required daily money market liquidity balance for
the rest of the month was nil markka and set the minimum reserve
requirement for January at 6.32 billion markka.
The central bank gave the following figures (FIM mln):
Required daily balance for remaining period nil
